## Setup (tl;dr)

```{r setup, include=TRUE}
library(learnr)
# functions for ABCRF
library(abcrf)
# function for weighted histogram
suppressMessages(library(weights, quietly=T))
# functions for CARTs
library(tree)
```

## Classification and regression tree

Random forests are a machine learning method for regression and classification. Its name comes from the fact of being constituted of "trees". These trees are classification and regression trees or CARTs.
